DOC.brief_summary: The purpose present study evaluate compare effect motor control exercise standard exercise pain , incapacity medicine intake subject unspecific low-back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Motor Control Exercises v Standard Exercises Unspecific Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Eighty-four subject unspecific low-back pain randomly recruit present study . The subject randomly allocate control group ( receive one hour standard physiotherapy exercise every day ten day ) intervention group ( receive one hour control motor exercise every day ten day ) . One month finish ten day , patient perform home-based exercise program two month ( control group perform home-based standard physiotherapy exercise ; intervention group perform home-based motor control exercise ) . Pain ( visual analogic scale ) , incapacity index ( Roland Morris questionnaire ) medicine intake ( diary ) evaluate intervention , one month three month end first ten day intervention .
DOC.criteria: subject independent walk subject unspecific low back pain least last two month subject least two recidives low back pain within last year subject concomitant pathology impede performance exercise pregnants subject oncologic pathology subject cognitive alteration impede understanding test
